name: BLiP FOOtBaLL
description: This game is an attempt to duplicate, on an Atari 2600, the handheld football games first released in the late nineteen-seventies. Much as in those games, your characters are red dashes on a black background. When you run the ball off the screen, you warp around the other side. The game is played by two players who alternate using the same joystick.

shot.caption: Showing the downs, yards-to-go and field position.
A game in progress. You cannot see the offensive player due to screen flicker but he is red.
A game in progress with colorful option. You cannot see the defensive players due to screen flicker but they are red.
